name: Curse (itch) (EK Games)
description: A very scary Horror game! The game has good graphics and no less the best sounds! We advise you to play who is over 16 years old. If you have any heart problems or you have any panic attacks, we do not advise you to turn on this game.If you do decide to download and play this game, I wish you good luck. Hope you stay alive) Control: WASD Run: Shift  Take some thing: E Inventory:  Tab Sit: C Turns: X Y Look at something: Q Pick up a flashlight: 1 2
